Mouth.help: 1 point that shows the angle of the fish's jaw.

Caudal fin.help: 2 points that describe the caudal fin (the tail of the fish).

Pectoral fin.help: 2 points that describe the pectoral fin (on the fish's "chest")

Gill cover.help: 3 points that describe the gill cover (operculum)

Head curves.help: 2 curves that describe the 'head' of the fish.

Fin curves.help: 2 curves that describe fins of the fish.

Dimensions.help: 2 lines that describe the height and length of the fish.
